name: Platgarm
description:
Platgarm is a 2D game inspired by classic platformer games, honestly it is pretty crude(It's the first game I upload) but i had fun with it, it is also short with 20 levels and a bonus test level, the can all be played in the order you want frome the level selection menu but if you just hit play you will start from the first level.You may have to reload the page 2 or 3 times before the game starts.

Download Platgarm for PC:

http://viid.me/qoqnta
